On *nix platforms, use the following paths:

See [XDG_Type](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/862b7f4982bb1ffdbd736dc4991908e5a0a54380/src/System.Management.Automation/CoreCLR/CorePsPlatform.cs#L48) for path details
- Default Install Location for Scripts/Modules - $HOME/.local/share/powershell/modules(scripts)
- Config - $HOME/.config/powershell/PowerShellGet [equivalent to Windows $env:LOCALAPPDATA]
